commit.message:
Fix PR c++/70096 (wrong code for pointer-to-member-function copy)

gcc/cp/ChangeLog:

	PR c++/70096
	* pt.c (tsubst_decl): Clear the DECL_MODE of the new decl.

gcc/testsuite/ChangeLog:

	PR c++/70096
	* g++.dg/template/ptrmem30.C: New test.

From-SVN: r234391
